data.message:
Keep it up buddy here is a free song if you want it have it .

Brother lynch hung the song.

(Pazuzu)
Scary shit i buried my bitch she said she wanted an ocean view i just want to hold you i told you it was bouncing in my skull like Michael Jordan playin ball i wanted her to have it all it was a tall order for this man both of us coming from a can but i heard of this land and it has this man he has a team they been making sick shit since 93 they found him hanging on a tree he was born dead like me his brother lynched him hung him sicx was his name X was to blame ain't none of their styles are the same they raise right though  C other niggas screaming in the first degree wrapped my girl in this thing it was marvelous tall G sparking this with nutty niggas that love to spit crumble the earth and slit my wrist pack that shit so meany ways to blow out hits hope the doctor is knowing this with beats like beta sooner or later I'm be at youre back tapping you on youre shoulder hey did you hear my rap you raised a nigga on youre platinum raps that's how i cap now i get to welcome you back.

(HOOK)pazuzu)
I'm that shadow of that man i am that fan this is my girls wedding band for me we rise from the sand we are undead bring me tech n9nes head from the neck up

(HOOK)Pookie)
I'm that shadow of that girl i am that fan this is my mans wedding band for me we rise from the sand we are undead bring me tech n9nes head from the neck up 

(Pookie)
Been barrel fuckin sad about nothing ice queen I'm mean got ahold of the sac team doom i am and today's the day i pick up the razor blade and split this shit the color of you pack that spliff i hold the earth with a grip picked up a 5th and mixed it with these red rum hits pulled out a pistol from my tits I'm to hot to know ain't the type to show O talk way to slow for you not to understand me you in the same room we walked away from i smell the sight of them in that room that you came from been mixing since i was young and it took me this way not knowing if i get to see my baby's live with my man on the other side watching as we make life  after he crawled inside and died that day he dies this way I'm his last lay look at the color of my eyes dose that tell you guy

(HOOK)Pookie)
I'm that shadow of that girl i am that fan this is my mans wedding band for me we rise from the sand we are undead bring me tech n9nes head from the neck up 

(HOOK)pazuzu)
I'm that shadow of that man i am that fan this is my girls wedding band for me we rise from the sand we are undead bring me tech n9nes head from the neck up

(Brother lynch hung)
Now hold me in don't let go I'm tippy toe with that doom made sick niggas like you howltips fly as I spit clear as day now teac what y'all say yup I'm get up and gogo slit your throat o no look at that smoke bro so hot at the tongue been killin niggas since we were young now I got two tieing one they want my tongue on that voodoo do you take him(yes) do you take her(yes) now here we go on your knee take that ring \tech-(WAIT)N9ne/ na this is a brother lynch hung thing got two that ain't seen each other for a long time now I'm show them how I end it in the beginning it was midevil........
